alert.note: Alert for Finney; Grant; Gray; Haskell; Seward; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 4:07PM CDT until June 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Seward County in southwestern Kansas... South central Finney County in southwestern Kansas... Southeastern Grant County in southwestern Kansas... Northeastern Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Gray County in southwestern Kansas... Haskell County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 406 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pierceville to near Satanta to near Moscow, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Cimarron, Sublette, Satanta, Pierceville, Moscow, Copeland, Ingalls, Charleston, Tice, Ryus, Cave and Plymell. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Finney; Grant; Gray; Haskell; Seward; Stevens
